Package net.antoniy.beacon

Interface Summary
Beacon Beacon provides a service for discovering devices in LAN network.
BeaconDeviceEventListener This interface is used by listeners of device related events and defines methods for handling the events.
BeaconEventListener This interface is used by listeners of beacon service events and defines methods for handling the events.
BeaconParams BeaconParams is used to store initialization parameters for the Beacon service.
DeviceInfo Instances of this type holds information about a discovered device on the network.
 

Class Summary
R  
R.attr  
R.string
